conclusion: A and B are moving towards each other in the same direction.
A is a pink car and B is a green car.
There are multiple cubes visible in the scene: purple, yellow, red, and blue.
B collides with the purple cube, causing it to change direction.
A collides with the yellow cube, altering its path.
B continues moving and collides with the red cube, affecting its trajectory further.
A moves away from the yellow cube and continues on its altered path.
A is deflected towards the upper right due to the collision with the yellow cube.
B is directed towards the left side after colliding with the red cube.
A ends up near the top right corner, away from the initial path.
B moves further left, past the red cube.
Final positions are determined by the collisions and deflections caused by the cubes.
A will stop near the top right area.
B will stop to the left side, beyond the red cube.
